snippet: Since 2011, the Foundation Beyond Belief has given several thousand dollars each fiscal quarter to a different religious group as part of an initiative called Challenge the Gap.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column notes Dale McGowan's Foundation Beyond Belief has been giving several thousand dollars each fiscal quarter to a different religious group as part of initiative called Challenge the Gap; foundation's next donation will be to Baptist Joint Committee for Religious Liberty, one of several groups that filed amicus briefs opposing concept of formal public prayer in Greece, NY.
lead_paragraph: Since 2011, the Foundation Beyond Belief has given several thousand dollars each fiscal quarter to a different religious group as part of an initiative called Challenge the Gap.

headline.print_headline: Humanist Foundation Reaches Out to Religious Groups, Testing a Divide
headline.main: Humanist Foundation Reaches Out to Religious Groups, Testing a Divide
